title: My Heart and Soul
description: The third and final book in the Holy Trinity Trilogy.After a long separation, Xan has finally found Trinity, only Trinity...has changed.Between Dark Magic, her time alone spent fighting for her life and the brutal loss of her soulmate Gerik, Xan's once sweet and innocent wife is no more.As the estranged couple try to fight their way through numerous betrayals and heartache back to one another, a storm is brewing off in the distance.One that will re-connect them both with the friends and family they lost...And quite possibly kill them all...Coming Winter, 2014/2015.
author: Madeline Sheehan
